data: Consultation with Pathologist is available. Contact TM
Indications for IM formulation HbIG:   - Liver Transplant  - Needlestick or bite / contact injury
Standard dose is 0.06 mL/kg to a maximum of 5 mL
Administer - Hepatitis B Immune Globulin IM
Timed, Administer 10 mL, IM, once, Indications: Liver Transplant, as 5 mL into each deltoid muscle
Routine, Administer 10 mL, IM, qdaily, Indications: Liver Transplant,T;N, as 5 mL into each gluteal muscle
Routine, Administer 10 mL, IM, qdaily, Indications: Liver Transplant,T;N, as 5 mL into each gluteal muscle
Routine, Administer 10 mL, IM, qMonThu, Indications: Liver Transplant,T;N, as 5 mL into each gluteal / deltoid muscle
